Public Interface IDuplexChannel Implements IInputChannel, IOutputChannel
type IDuplexChannel = interface interface IOutputChannel interface IInputChannel interface ICommunicationObject interface IChannel

summary.span: Define la interfaz que un canal debe implementar para enviar y recibir mensajes.

span.span: Defines the interface that a channel must implement to both send and receive messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-interface-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-interface-note.md)] La interfaz es la unión de las interfaces y .The interface is the union of the and interfaces. La interfaz no impone ninguna correlación entre y cuando se implementa.The interface does not mandate any correlation between the and when implemented. Esto significa, en particular, que el contrato no impone que el remitente de mensajes que se reciben a través de sea igual al destinatario de mensajes enviados a través de .This means, in particular, that the contract does not mandate that the sender of messages that are received through the is equal to the recipient of messages sent through the .
